name: Time (itch) (Vynn)
description:
You wake up with no recollection of where you are or what has happened to you.
Continue on as best you can in this scenario and figure out just what you have become in this short visual novel.

Created as part of the Vampire the Masquerade Game Jam 2021.
Special thanks to PatBates for helping fix my spaghetti code.

This is the first game I have ever created. 
Thank you for playing.
